post.title: can i see 3d on my telly?
post.content: hello. the wife and i are looking to buy a blue-ray player. we have come accros a nive bargain for the panasonic dmp-bd110eb 3d blue-ray player. our telly is 6 months old and is a panasonic viera px-t42g20b which is not 3d. however, is it possible to view 3d movies on this tely through the blue-ray player? any comments well appreciated. cheers.
